dialogue.speaker: Charlie
dialogue.message: Based on my investigation, I believe Alice is the assassin. Let's vote for Alice.

dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I have no reason to suspect anything, I will continue to blend in with the villagers. Let's focus on other possibilities, Charlie.
